argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_frinxp | |- ( R Fr A <-> ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) Fr A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_soinxp | |- ( R Or A <-> ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) Or A ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_anbi12i | |- ( ( R Fr A /\ R Or A ) <-> ( ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) Fr A /\ ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) Or A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-we | |- ( R We A <-> ( R Fr A /\ R Or A ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-we | |- ( ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) We A <-> ( ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) Fr A /\ ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) Or A ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( R We A <-> ( R i^i ( A X. A ) ) We A ) |
